channel.title: PI Staff Message

item.title: PI Staff Message
item.dc:creator: @rich1716 rich1716
item.description:
@rich1716 wrote:

So I found the code
public void stafflogin(){
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
if(playerRights == 0 && isDonator > 1){
c2.sendMessage(“Donator <img=0> " + playerName + " <img=0> has logged in.”);
}
if(playerRights == 1){
c2.sendMessage(“Moderator <img=1> " + playerName + " <img=1> has logged in.”);
}
if(playerRights == 2){
c2.sendMessage(“Administrator <img=2> " + playerName + " <img=2> has logged in.”);
}
if(playerRights == 3){
c2.sendMessage(“OWNER <img=2> " + playerName + " <img=2> has logged in!”);
}
}
}
}
My question is now how do i do it for certain people only? Like for example. Co-Owner Mike Has Just Logged in. Like a custom one

Read full topic
